dcterms:creator: M. Defferrard
X. Bresson
P. Vandergheynst
dcterms:description: ChebNet is inspired from spectral graph theory, where the Discrete Fourier Transform (DFT) is expanded to graph signals.
dcterms:title: ChebNet

dcterms:creator: J. Du
S. Zhang
G. Wu
J. M. Moura
S. Kar
dcterms:description: TAGCN makes the signal of a vertex dependent on the signals of its neighbors located at most C connections.
dcterms:title: Topology Adaptive GCN (TAGCN)

dcterms:creator: T. N. Kipf
M. Welling
dcterms:description: GCN is a neural network that uses a linear function to diffuse the signal on the graph, where the values of the signal on a vertex depend on the values of the neighboring vertex signals.
dcterms:title: Graph Convolutional Network (GCN)

dcterms:creator: P. Veličković
G. Cucurull
A. Casanova
A. Romero
P. Liò
Y. Bengio
dcterms:description: GAT learns parameters that measure the importance of the neighbors considering all vertices independently, using an attention mechanism.
dcterms:title: Graph Attention Network (GAT)
